title: Strictly white collar
creator_credit: W.D. Scott & Co and Norman Savage
brief_description: Shows the application of methods-time-measurement to office procedures. The object of methods study is to reduce movement to an absolute minimum consistent with maximum speed and efficiency by eliminating, simplifying combining movements and changing their sequences if necessary.
